CATEGORIES SOFAS/SECTIONAL SOFAS/
OTTOMAN - ARMCHAIRS/OTTOMANS - SMALL ARMCHAIRS/CHAIRS/STOOLS
PRODUCT ARMCHAIR
FRAME IN METAL COATED WITH EPOXY POWDER, WOOD AND POLYURETHANE
UPHOLSTERY IN HIDE LEATHER IN THE FOLLOWING COLORS:
RUSSIAN RED (5008), WHITE (5007), OLIVE (5006), BLACK (5005), DARK BROWN (5004), DARK BROWN EXTRA (5013) GREY (5003), SAND (5001), TOBACCO (5015).
PRODUCT ARMCHAIR 70 CM.
FRAME IN METAL COATED WITH EPOXY
POWDER, WOOD AND POLYURETHANE SEAT CUSHION DOWN-FILLED WITH RESILIENT INNER CORE BACKREST CUSHION DOWN-FILLED THROW PILLOWS DOWN-FILLED (ON REQUEST WITH UPCHARGE) UPHOLSTERY IN HIDE-LEATHER IN THE FOLLOWING COLORS: RUSSIAN RED (5008), WHITE (5007), OLIVE (5006), BLACK (5005), DARK BROWN (5004), DARK BROWN EXTRA (5013) GREY (5003), SAND (5001), TOBACCO (5015).
CUSHIONS UPHOLSTERY REMOVABLE FABRIC OR LEATHER COVERS
